title: Cane Creek takes to the sky with new Helm DJ 90mm suspension fork
content:
Compared to standard mountain bikes, we imagine that the market for dirt jumping components is fairly small. But that hasn’t stopped Cane Creek from building what they want to ride. Head down to Fletcher, NC, and you’ll find a passionate group of talented riders, who also make some of the best components around. Many of those same […]

The post Cane Creek takes to the sky with new Helm DJ 90mm suspension fork appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
